memory[0] = 32'b00100011101111011111111111111100;	//	main:		addi	$sp, $sp, -4
memory[1] = 32'b10101111101111110000000000000000;	//			sw	$ra, 0($sp)
memory[2] = 32'b00110100000001000000000000000000;	//			ori	$a0, $zero, 0
memory[3] = 32'b00110100000001010000000000010000;	//			ori	$a1, $zero, 16
memory[4] = 32'b00110100000001100100000000010000;	//			ori	$a2, $zero, 16400
memory[5] = 32'b00001100000000000000000000000111;	//			jal	vbsme
memory[6] = 32'b00001000000000000000000000000110;	//	end:		j	end
memory[7] = 32'b00110100000000100000000000000000;	//	vbsme:		ori	$v0, $zero, 0
memory[8] = 32'b00110100000000110000000000000000;	//			ori	$v1, $zero, 0
memory[9] = 32'b00110100000100010000000000000000;	//			ori	$s1, $zero, 0
memory[10] = 32'b00110100000100100000000000000000;	//			ori	$s2, $zero, 0
memory[11] = 32'b00100011111100000000000000000000;	//			addi	$s0, $ra, 0
memory[12] = 32'b10001100100011000000000000001000;	//			lw	$t4, 8($a0)
memory[13] = 32'b10001100100011010000000000001100;	//			lw	$t5, 12($a0)
memory[14] = 32'b00000000000001010100000000100000;	//			add	$t0, $0, $a1
memory[15] = 32'b00100000000101110000000111110100;	//			addi	$s7, $0, 500
memory[16] = 32'b10001100100010010000000000000000;	//			lw	$t1, 0($a0)
memory[17] = 32'b10001100100100110000000000000100;	//			lw	$s3, 4($a0)
memory[18] = 32'b00000001001011000101000000100010;	//			sub	$t2, $t1, $t4
memory[19] = 32'b00000010011011010101100000100010;	//			sub	$t3, $s3, $t5
memory[20] = 32'b00100001101011011111111111111111;	//			addi	$t5, $t5, -1
memory[21] = 32'b00100001100011001111111111111111;	//			addi	$t4, $t4, -1
memory[22] = 32'b00000000000001011100000000100000;	//			add	$t8, $0, $a1
memory[23] = 32'b00000000000001101100100000100000;	//			add	$t9, $0, $a2
memory[24] = 32'b00001100000000000000000000111111;	//			jal	window
memory[25] = 32'b00100010001100010000000000000001;	//	go_right:	addi	$s1, $s1, 1
memory[26] = 32'b00100011000110000000000000000100;	//			addi	$t8, $t8, 4
memory[27] = 32'b00100001000010000000000000000100;	//			addi	$t0, $t0, 4
memory[28] = 32'b00001100000000000000000000111111;	//			jal	window
memory[29] = 32'b00010110001010110000000000000010;	//			bne	$s1, $t3, continue
memory[30] = 32'b00010110010010100000000000000001;	//			bne	$s2, $t2, continue
memory[31] = 32'b00001000000000000000000001100000;	//			j	done
memory[32] = 32'b00010010010010100000000000010011;	//	continue:	beq	$s2, $t2, up_right
memory[33] = 32'b00100010010100100000000000000001;	//	down_left:	addi	$s2, $s2, 1
memory[34] = 32'b00100010001100011111111111111111;	//			addi	$s1, $s1, -1
memory[35] = 32'b00000000000010011001100000100000;	//			add	$s3, $0, $t1
memory[36] = 32'b00100010011100111111111111111111;	//			addi	$s3, $s3, -1
memory[37] = 32'b00000000000100111001100010000000;	//			sll	$s3, $s3, 2
memory[38] = 32'b00000011000100111100000000100000;	//			add	$t8, $t8, $s3
memory[39] = 32'b00000001000100110100000000100000;	//			add	$t0, $t0, $s3
memory[40] = 32'b00001100000000000000000000111111;	//			jal	window
memory[41] = 32'b00010010010010101111111111110001;	//			beq	$s2, $t2, go_right
memory[42] = 32'b00010010001000000000000000000001;	//			beq	$s1, $0, go_down
memory[43] = 32'b00001000000000000000000000100001;	//			j	down_left
memory[44] = 32'b00100010010100100000000000000001;	//	go_down:	addi	$s2, $s2, 1
memory[45] = 32'b00000000000010011001100000100000;	//			add	$s3, $0, $t1
memory[46] = 32'b00000000000100111001100010000000;	//			sll	$s3, $s3, 2
memory[47] = 32'b00000011000100111100000000100000;	//			add	$t8, $t8, $s3
memory[48] = 32'b00000001000100110100000000100000;	//			add	$t0, $t0, $s3
memory[49] = 32'b00001100000000000000000000111111;	//			jal	window
memory[50] = 32'b00010010001000000000000000000001;	//			beq	$s1, $0, up_right
memory[51] = 32'b00001000000000000000000000100001;	//			j	down_left
memory[52] = 32'b00100010001100010000000000000001;	//	up_right:	addi	$s1, $s1, 1
memory[53] = 32'b00100010010100101111111111111111;	//			addi	$s2, $s2, -1
memory[54] = 32'b00000000000010011001100000100000;	//			add	$s3, $0, $t1
memory[55] = 32'b00100010011100111111111111111111;	//			addi	$s3, $s3, -1
memory[56] = 32'b00000000000100111001100010000000;	//			sll	$s3, $s3, 2
memory[57] = 32'b00000011000100111100000000100010;	//			sub	$t8, $t8, $s3
memory[58] = 32'b00000001000100110100000000100010;	//			sub	$t0, $t0, $s3
memory[59] = 32'b00001100000000000000000000111111;	//			jal	window
memory[60] = 32'b00010010001010111111111111110001;	//			beq	$s1, $t3, go_down
memory[61] = 32'b00010010010000001111111111011101;	//			beq	$s2, $0, go_right
memory[62] = 32'b00001000000000000000000000110100;	//			j	up_right
memory[63] = 32'b10001111000100110000000000000000;	//	window:		lw	$s3, 0($t8)
memory[64] = 32'b10001111001101000000000000000000;	//			lw	$s4, 0($t9)
memory[65] = 32'b00000010011101001001100000100010;	//			sub	$s3, $s3, $s4
memory[66] = 32'b00000000000100110000100000101010;	//			slt	$at, $0, $s3
memory[67] = 32'b00010100001000000000000000000001;	//			bne	$at, $zero, positive
memory[68] = 32'b00000000000100111001100000100010;	//			sub	$s3, $0, $s3
memory[69] = 32'b00000010110100111011000000100000;	//	positive:	add	$s6, $s6, $s3
memory[70] = 32'b00010001111011010000000000000100;	//			beq	$t7, $t5, end_column
memory[71] = 32'b00100001111011110000000000000001;	//			addi	$t7, $t7, 1
memory[72] = 32'b00100011000110000000000000000100;	//			addi	$t8, $t8, 4
memory[73] = 32'b00100011001110010000000000000100;	//			addi	$t9, $t9, 4
memory[74] = 32'b00001000000000000000000000111111;	//			j	window
memory[75] = 32'b00010001110011000000000000000111;	//	end_column:	beq	$t6, $t4, end_window
memory[76] = 32'b00000000000000000111100000100000;	//			add	$t7, $0, $0
memory[77] = 32'b00100001110011100000000000000001;	//			addi	$t6, $t6, 1
memory[78] = 32'b00000001001011011001100000100010;	//			sub	$s3, $t1, $t5
memory[79] = 32'b00000000000100111001100010000000;	//			sll	$s3, $s3, 2
memory[80] = 32'b00000011000100111100000000100000;	//			add	$t8, $t8, $s3
memory[81] = 32'b00100011001110010000000000000100;	//			addi	$t9, $t9, 4
memory[82] = 32'b00001000000000000000000000111111;	//			j	window
memory[83] = 32'b00000000000010001100000000100000;	//	end_window:	add	$t8, $0, $t0
memory[84] = 32'b00000000000001101100100000100000;	//			add	$t9, $0, $a2
memory[85] = 32'b00000000000000000111000000100000;	//			add	$t6, $0, $0
memory[86] = 32'b00000000000000000111100000100000;	//			add	$t7, $0, $0
memory[87] = 32'b00000010111101100000100000101010;	//			slt	$at, $s7, $s6
memory[88] = 32'b00010000001000000000000000000010;	//			beq	$at, $zero, replace
memory[89] = 32'b00000000000000001011000000100000;	//			add	$s6, $0, $0
memory[90] = 32'b00000011111000000000000000001000;	//			jr	$ra
memory[91] = 32'b00000000000101101011100000100000;	//	replace:	add	$s7, $0, $s6
memory[92] = 32'b00000000000100100001000000100000;	//			add	$v0, $0, $s2
memory[93] = 32'b00000000000100010001100000100000;	//			add	$v1, $0, $s1
memory[94] = 32'b00000000000000001011000000100000;	//			add	$s6, $0, $0
memory[95] = 32'b00000011111000000000000000001000;	//			jr	$ra
memory[96] = 32'b00000010000000001111100000100000;	//	done:		add	$ra, $s0, $0
memory[97] = 32'b00000011111000000000000000001000;	//			jr	$ra
